p: Based on statistical analysis, GEO weight yield was significantly affected by location of cultivation and maturity stage at harvesting. However, weight yields were not significantly affected by variety factor at 95% confidence interval (p > 0.05). Moreover, chemical peak intensity of ginger essential oil was significantly affected by maturity stage. However, variety factor was not significantly affecting the chemical peak intensities of GEO at 95% confidence interval (p > 0.05).
